rukus.text: And indeed, (before this), We did save the Children of Israel from disgraceful punishment
Caused by Firon (Pharaoh), indeed he was proud (haughty and arrogant, even) among unruly transgressors
And We chose them before above the nations, with knowledge
And granted them Signs in which there was an open trial
Verily, these (People of the Quraish), they openly say
There is nothing beyond our first death, and we shall not be resurrected
Then bring (back) our forefathers, if you say the truth
Are they better than the people of Tubba' and those who were before them? We destroyed them because they were criminals (guilty of sin)
And We did not create the heavens and the earth, and all between them, just as (an idle) play
We did not create them except for true (and noble) ends: But most of them do not understand
Surely, the Day of Sorting Out is the time appointed for all of them—
The Day when the nearest of kin can be of no use to the related one, even the least, and no help can they receive
Except such as those who receive Allah’s Mercy: Verily, He is Exalted in Might (Al-Aziz), Most Merciful (Ar-Raheem)
